author: jason.carver
content: Hm, well I suppose I'm missing a lot of background here, so I'm probably just missing something obvious. Why provide the witness at all if you are trusting a punishment mechanism to incentivize a truthful trace?

author: afdudley
content: oh yeah, that's tricky. https://hackmd.io/uTptoEtLQwOrt9sm2fc2cw?view the short answer is there are multiple parties and the punishment mechanism is reading the witness.
